name: Disguised [2021]
description:
A short stealth game made in Unity.

Your goal is to sneak into the compound and assassinate the Boss waiting at the end. Along the way, you must avoid detection and eliminate enemies, using their blood to obtain disguises that offer special benefits. 

Main Features:

- Dynamic viewcones that obscure enemies outside of your vision

- Enemy patrol and alert mechanics governed by a state machine

- Disguise mechanic that allows for temporary disguises to be created, granting special abilities depending on the type of disguise as well as the ability to walk past enemies without alerting them.

Controls:

E: Interact with objects and Takedown enemies when behind them

R: Acquire Disguises from blood splatters (left behind after eliminating enemies)

Y: Clean blood splatter (Janitor disguise only)

M1: Shoot (Guard disguise only)

1-4: Activate acquired disguise

(Note: the prealpha download only contains an unfinished prototype of stealth and guard patrol mechanics)
